revision.text:
<!--전쟁_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = MilitaryConflict
| mappings =	
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 분쟁 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 전체 | ontologyProperty = isPartOfMilitaryConflict }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 장소 | ontologyProperty = place }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 날짜 | ontologyProperty = date }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 결과 | ontologyProperty = result }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 상태 | ontologyProperty = status }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 교전국1 | ontologyProperty = combatant }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 교전국2 | ontologyProperty = combatant }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 교전국3 | ontologyProperty = combatant }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 지휘관1 | ontologyProperty = commander }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 지휘관2 | ontologyProperty = commander }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 지휘관3 | ontologyProperty = commander }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 병력1 | ontologyProperty = strength }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 병력2 | ontologyProperty = strength }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 병력3 | ontologyProperty = strength }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사상자1 | ontologyProperty = causalties }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사상자2 | ontologyProperty = causalties }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사상자3 | ontologyProperty = causalties }}
end}}

|이유 =
